docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 16--Whatever may have been the naval objectives of the German Government in constructing three pocket battleships, it now seems certain that at least two of them put to sea just before the outbreak of the war with...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 16--Whatever may have been the naval objectives of the German Government in constructing three pocket battleships, it now seems certain that at least two of them put to sea just before the outbreak of the war with instructions to act as commerce raiders and avoid contact with the enemy's naval units.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: BERLIN, Dec. 16--For more than three hours this morning Chancellor Adolf Hitler conferred with the leaders of Germany's armed forces in the Chancellery. What occasioned the conference and what was discussed remains a secret to those who attended it....
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Dec. 16--For more than three hours this morning Chancellor Adolf Hitler conferred with the leaders of Germany's armed forces in the Chancellery. What occasioned the conference and what was discussed remains a secret to those who attended it. For complete silence is maintained about it in official quarters.
docs.abstract: Spee's fate held subject of Hitler conf with mil leaders
